name: Momi
description:
- About - 

 Momi is an action game where a girl wearing a ribbon travels and walks around the World of Paintings. Explore a metaphysical world and find your favorite landscapes!

- Details- Pixel Art + Metaphysical paintings

Momi’s core concept is using the video game medium to wander in various paintings. This game has been made for people for want to experience walking in various works of art, more than playing a classical platformer action game.

Momi’s backgrounds are based on the metaphysical paintings of Giorgio de Chirico, rendered in pixel art with a limited number of colors.

Enjoy the distorted perspective of the architecture, the inconsistency of unrelated objects cohabitating in the same place, and the imaginary world created by them.

- Controls (PC) -

・Arrows or WASD: Move

・Space: Jump

・Left Ctrl/LMB: Dash

・R: Open Menu 

This work was created as a university graduation project in early 2022 and will continue to be developed in the future. 

Twitter  @futinuro
